code:
gantt
    dateFormat DDD
    axisFormat %
    todayMarker off
    tickInterval 1month
    title Revisited Scenario

    section Group 1
    Time-based notifications :active, a, 0, 60d
    Targeted emails :active b, 0, 60d

    section Group 2
    In-store digital coupons : c, after a b, 60d
    Store greeters : d, after a b, 60d
repo_description: My personal website, as well as the contents that powers it.
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
